title: 85/546/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 December 1985 approving a programme for the flower and ornamental plant sector in the Land North Rhine-Westphalia pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 December 1985
approving a programme for the flower and ornamental plant sector in the Land North Rhine-Westphalia pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the German text is authentic)
(85/546/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the flower and ornamental plant sector in the Land North Rhine-Westphalia forwarded by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 11 June 1985 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 December 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1985, p. 1.
